SagaFeature.Description: An imposing structure stands here. Wind shrine within Naikū complex
This weathered edifice has stood for generations. Inner Shrine of Ise Jingū, dedicated to Amaterasu Ōmikami
Auxiliary shrine within Naikū complex The architecture speaks of both purpose and permanence. There's an undeniable energy here.
